item.title: Creating an actual OpenFlow-enabled Switch
item.author: sumitros@gmail.com (Sumitro Bhaumik)
item.description: Hardware needed to create a OpenFlow switch All of this should be available at a good computer hardware store. We ordered it from Amazon PC with enough USB 3.0 ports PCI Express USB 3.0 card with extra ports if (1) is missing (See image) A PCI Express extender if (2) does not fit the cabinet USB 3.0 to Gigabit Ethernet adapters PCI USB Card
